page.title: 05GUEST HOUSE LITTLE MILL
page.content: A local farming family have exploited the surge of tourism into Wales by providing superior accomodation for 1-2 weeks holidays and or bed and breakfast for the overnight traveller, also evening meals and business lunches whilst still retaining the agricultural side.Potatoes,wheat and barley are still grown, the remaining land is given over to grass keep. Visitors come from all over the world, mainly citydwellers wanting a taste of country life. Indeed many return regularly and take an active interest in the farm. The highlight of the day is the homebaked menu.A sample of dishes include:_ courgette and brie soup; avacado salad; sauteed veal with mushrooms; dessert and the cheeseboard.Delicious!
